CAREER SUMMARY  
 
September 2021  - PRESENT  
STERIS AST (Applied Sterilisation Technologies)  
Global Process Safety & Engineering Manager  
Process Safety Manager for a number of ch emical sterilization facilities throughout 
EMEA, APAC & AMER. Working directly with Senior Director for HSE to manage all 
PSM requirements for sites operating under a variety of regulatory frameworks 
including COMAH, SEVESO and OSHA. Focus on the developme nt of a fully -featured 
and company -specific Process Safety Management Approach and documented 
framework, covering extensive policies and standards to define and manage 
regulatory and internal compliance.  
 
Specific tasks include:  
• Development of organizatio nal PSM Framework  
• Development of ancillary PSM Documentation including standards on PHA, MoC 
and facility readiness  
• Development and delivery of Process Safety Training at different organizational 
levels  
• Organisation, facilitation and resolution of PH A activities for all sites including 
HAZID, HAZOP, & LOPA  
• Regulatory management and gap analysis  
• Involvement in major engineering projects to maintain process safety compliance  
 
June 2014 - SEPTEMBER 2021  
ABS Consulting Ltd.  
    
Senior Engineer (Process Safety Management)  
Main activities and responsibilities Involvement in projects with a focus on Process 
Risk Identification & Management, including the applicat ion of Bow Ties, and 
Building Risk Assessments. Focus upon the facilitation, scribing and reporting of 
formal risk studies including HAZID, HAZOP and LOPA/SIL Determination. Additional 
works include aiding in the development and delivery of training in a n umber of 
safety topics (including Root Cause Analysis and Bow Tie Risk Analysis) and the 
development of Process Safety Management Frameworks and associated 
documentations. Work for a wide variety of different clients across the Oil & Gas and 
Chemical Indus tries including experience in Business Development and Project 
Management.  
 
STERIS/Synergy Health  
Lead Safety Engineer  for STERIS EMEA Process Safety Management development 
scheme. Project including:  
• Development of STERIS Process Safety Management Framework and Process 
Hazard Analysis Standards & Procedures (inc luding procedures for HAZID, HAZOP & 
LOPA).  
• Full facilitation, including preparation, management, and reporting for HAZID 
studies at sites in Thorne, Daventry, and Tullamore.  
• Full facilitation, including preparation, management, and reporting for HAZOP  
studies at sites in Thorne, Tullamore, and Venlo.  
• Full facilitation, including preparation, management, and reporting for LOPA study 
at site in Thorne.  
 
ADM Bulgaria  
HAZOP Study of new build Ethanol Production Facility for Amylum Bulgaria Plant 
(Razgrad, Bulgaria)  
 
NIS 
HAZOP Facilitation training. Work including delivery of training, preparation of 
training materials and supervision of example activities.  
 
Essencia  
HAZOP and What -If Analysis Facilitation training. Work including delivery of training, 
preparation of training materials and supervision of example activities for students 
at Ghent University and varied representatives from local industry.  
 
Diamond Offshor e 
Development of Performance Standards for a series of Jack -up drilling rigs to be 
developed in UK waters  
 
KBR  
QRA studies through FEED and EPC stages for the Jazan Refinery, Marine Terminal & 
Integrated Gasification Combined Cycle (IGSS) Complex, in the Kingdom of Saudi 
Arabia. Work included HAZID, consequence and risk assessment, building protection 
recommendations and Land Use Planning (LUP) guidance.  
    
 
GKN (GKN Aerospace and Hoeganaes Powdered Metals)  
Delivered on -site support in developing/building/re viewing bowties, with 
abbreviated training, in Sweden.  
 
Tereos  
Developed corporate Safety Framework and edited/updated many/all corporate 
Operating Procedures, incl. PTW.  
 
Colgate -Palmolive  
HAZOP Analysis for CP’s Therwill Plant as part of Process Safety  Management (PSM) 
audit and developing a Preliminary Hazard Assessment (PHA) report.  
 
FDH JV  
Project Coordinator and Technical Scribe for the 2 year KNPC Al -Zour Refinery 
Project in Amsterdam and New Delhi, India. Developed and reviewed HAZOP and 
SIL/LOPA  reports for all cases. Extensive study coordination, working with a wide 
range of stakeholders and study chairmen  
 
 
Key Skills  
▪ Process Safety Management  
▪ HAZID, HAZOP & LOPA Facilitation and Processing  
▪ Bow Tie Risk Analysis  
▪ Development and Delivery of Tailor -made Training Packages  
▪ Development of Safety Standards and Process Safety Documentation  
▪ Project Management  
▪ Visual Basic and MATLAB Programming
